text: The Fiddler's Fakebook The Fiddler's Fakebook, by David Brody, is a collection of fiddle tunes in lead sheet form (naturally without lyrics.) It includes tunes in the following styles: * England * Scotland * Ireland * Shetland * French Canadian * Nova Scotia/Cape Breton * New England * Old-Time * Bluegrass * Texas Style * Western Swing ==See also== *List of North American folk music traditions ==Notes== Category:Folk music publications
title: The Fiddler's Fakebook
